title: 5 Tips to Starting an Orchard
itunes:title: 5 Tips to Starting an Orchard & Growing Fruit
description: Starting an orchard with the correct fruit trees and berry plants for your climate is crucial to getting a harvest. Choose the correct variety and pollination type for your area with these tips. Melissa walks you through the best fruit types for small areas, larger areas, pollination (cross pollination vs. self-pollination), growing berries, chill hours, adding in new varieties, increasing your harvest. Snag the full written show notes at https://melissaknorris.com/169

author: melissa@melissaknorris.com (Melissa K. Norris 5th Generation Homesteader)
